allowlistDestinationChain(uint64,bool).details: Allow a destination chain to receive messages from this contract.

params._allowed: Whether the destination chain is allowed.
params._destinationChainSelector: The chain selector of the destination chain.

authorizeUserForChain(uint64,bool).details: Authorize cross-chain operations for a user on a specific destination chain.

params._destinationChainSelector: The chain selector of the destination chain.

constructor.details: Constructor initializes the contract with the router address.

params._router: The address of the router contract.

getFeeForEnterMarketsRequest(uint64,addr.details: Get the fee required to send an enter markets request.

params._destinationChainSelector: The chain selector of the destination chain.
params._feeToken: The address of the token to pay for fees.

getFeeForExitMarketRequest(uint64,addres.details: Get the fee required to send an exit market request.

params._destinationChainSelector: The chain selector of the destination chain.
params._feeToken: The address of the token to pay for fees.

requestEnterMarkets(uint64,address,addre.details: Request to enter markets on behalf of a user on another chain.

params._destinationChainSelector: The chain selector of the destination chain.
params._feeToken: The address of the token to pay for fees. Set to address(0) for native gas.
params._pTokens: The array of pToken addresses to enter.
params._user: The user to enter markets for.

returns.messageId: The ID of the sent message.

requestExitMarket(uint64,address,address.details: Request to exit a market on behalf of a user on another chain.

params._destinationChainSelector: The chain selector of the destination chain.
params._feeToken: The address of the token to pay for fees. Set to address(0) for native gas.
params._user: The user to exit market for.

returns.messageId: The ID of the sent message.

setReceiver(uint64,address).details: Set the receiver contract address for a destination chain.

params._destinationChainSelector: The chain selector of the destination chain.
params._receiver: The address of the receiver contract on the destination chain.

withdraw(address).details: Withdraw native tokens from this contract.

params._beneficiary: The address to send the tokens to.

acceptOwnership().notice: Allows an ownership transfer to be completed by the recipient.

transferOwnership(address).notice: Allows an owner to begin transferring ownership to a new address.
